Forms

Used in step by step processes, forms contain multiple related fields that require user input. Form interactions are detailed on this page.

Text field

Address cannot be that short. 
<form action="" method="">
    <h2>Text field</h2>
    <div class="spacer-32"></div>

    <div class="cmx-form-group">
        <label for="name-field">Name</label>
        <input type="text" class="cmx-form-control" id="name-field" placeholder="Enter name" name="" value="" />
    </div>
    <!-- end .form-group -->

    <div class="spacer-32"></div>
    
        <div class="cmx-form-group">
            <label for="password">Password</label>
            <input type="password" class="cmx-form-control" id="password" placeholder="Enter password" name="password" value="" />
        </div>
        <!-- end .form-group -->
    
        <div class="spacer-32"></div>

    <div class="cmx-form-group active">
        <label for="email-field">Email</label>
        <input type="email" class="cmx-form-control" id="email-field" placeholder="Enter email address" name="" value="" />
    </div>
    <!-- end .form-group .active -->  

    <div class="spacer-32"></div>

    <div class="cmx-form-group error">
        <label for="address-field">Address</label>
        <input type="text" class="cmx-form-control" id="address-field" placeholder="..." name="" value="" />
        <span class="cmx-error-message">Address cannot be that short.</span>
    </div>
    <!-- end .form-group .error -->
</form>
.cmx-form-group {
    label {
        display: inline-block;
        font-size: $font-size-12;
        line-height: $line-height-12;
        color: $deep-blue;
        padding-bottom: 6px;
        margin-bottom: 0px;
        cursor: pointer;
    } // end label

    .cmx-form-control {
        display: block;
        width: 100%;
        &--icon-trail,
        &--icon-lead{
                width:100%;
                height:auto;
                position: relative;
                &::before{
                        position: absolute;
                        line-height:1.5rem;
                        font-size: 1.5rem;
                        top:0.75rem;
                        color:$bright-blue;
                }
        }
        &--icon-trail{
                input[type]{
                        padding-right: 2.5rem;
                }
                &::before{
                        position: absolute;
                        right:1rem;
                }
        }
        &--icon-lead{
                input[type]{
                        padding-left: 2.5rem;
                }
                &::before{
                        left:1rem;
                }
        }
    } // end form-control

    &.active {
        input[type="text"],
        input[type="password"],
        input[type="email"] {
            border: 1px solid $bright-blue;
            background: $true-white;
        }
    } // end active class

    &.error {
        input[type="text"],
        input[type="password"],
        input[type="email"] {
            border:1px solid $true-red;
            background: rgba(238, 61, 66, 0.05);

            &:active,
            &:focus,
            &.active,
            &.focus {
                outline: 0 none;
                border-color: $bright-blue;
                background: $true-white;
            }
        }

        .cmx-error-message {
            font-size: $font-size-12;
            color: $true-red;
            width: 100%;
            display: inline-block;
            text-align: right;
        }
    } // end error class

    input[type="text"],
    input[type="password"],
    input[type="email"],
    input[type="search"] {
        font-size: $font-size-16;
        line-height: $line-height-16;
        border-radius: $radius-3;
        height: 48px;
        padding: 16px;
        border: 1px solid #ADAEBB;
        background: $true-white;

        &:hover, 
        &:active,
        &:focus,
        &.hover,
        &.active,
        &.focus {
            outline: 0 none;
            border-color: $bright-blue;
            background: $true-white;
        }

        &::-webkit-input-placeholder { /* Chrome/Opera/Safari */
          color: $medium-grey;
          font-size: $font-size-16;
        }

        &::-moz-placeholder { /* Firefox 19+ */
          color: $medium-grey;
          font-size: $font-size-16;
        }

        &:-ms-input-placeholder { /* IE 10+ */
          color: $medium-grey;
          font-size: $font-size-16;
        }

        &:-moz-placeholder { /* Firefox 18- */
          color: $medium-grey;
          font-size: $font-size-16;
        }
    } // end input(s) basic definition
} // end form group
.cmx-form-group label {
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  line-height: 0.75rem;
  color: #001B3A;
  padding-bottom: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 0px;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.cmx-form-group .cmx-form-control {
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
}

.cmx-form-group .cmx-form-control--icon-trail,
.cmx-form-group .cmx-form-control--icon-lead {
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    position: relative;
}

.cmx-form-group .cmx-form-control--icon-trail::before,
.cmx-form-group .cmx-form-control--icon-lead::before {
    position: absolute;
    line-height: 1.5rem;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    top: 0.75rem;
    color: #3FA9F5;
}

.cmx-form-group .cmx-form-control--icon-trail input[type] {
    padding-right: 2.5rem;
}

.cmx-form-group .cmx-form-control--icon-trail::before {
    position: absolute;
    right: 1rem;
}

.cmx-form-group .cmx-form-control--icon-lead input[type] {
    padding-left: 2.5rem;
}

.cmx-form-group .cmx-form-control--icon-lead::before {
    left: 1rem;
}

.cmx-form-group.active input[type="text"],
.cmx-form-group.active input[type="password"],
.cmx-form-group.active input[type="email"] {
  border: 1px solid #3FA9F5;
  background: #FFF;
}

.cmx-form-group.error input[type="text"],
.cmx-form-group.error input[type="password"],
.cmx-form-group.error input[type="email"] {
  border: 1px solid #EE3D42;
  background: rgba(238, 61, 66, 0.05);
}

.cmx-form-group.error input[type="text"]:active, 
.cmx-form-group.error input[type="text"]:focus, 
.cmx-form-group.error input[type="text"].active, 
.cmx-form-group.error input[type="text"].focus,
.cmx-form-group.error input[type="password"]:active, 
.cmx-form-group.error input[type="password"]:focus, 
.cmx-form-group.error input[type="password"].active, 
.cmx-form-group.error input[type="password"].focus,
.cmx-form-group.error input[type="email"]:active,
.cmx-form-group.error input[type="email"]:focus,
.cmx-form-group.error input[type="email"].active,
.cmx-form-group.error input[type="email"].focus {
  outline: 0 none;
  border-color: #3FA9F5;
  background: #FFF;
}

.cmx-form-group.error .cmx-error-message {
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  color: #EE3D42;
  width: 100%;
  display: inline-block;
  text-align: right;
}

.cmx-form-group input[type="text"],
.cmx-form-group input[type="password"],
.cmx-form-group input[type="email"],
.cmx-form-group input[type="search"] {
  font-size: 1rem;
  line-height: 1rem;
  border-radius: 3px;
  height: 48px;
  padding: 16px;
  border: 1px solid #ADAEBB;
  background: #FFF;
}

.cmx-form-group input[type="text"]:hover, 
.cmx-form-group input[type="text"]:active, 
.cmx-form-group input[type="text"]:focus, 
.cmx-form-group input[type="text"].hover, 
.cmx-form-group input[type="text"].active, 
.cmx-form-group input[type="text"].focus,
.cmx-form-group input[type="password"]:hover, 
.cmx-form-group input[type="password"]:active, 
.cmx-form-group input[type="password"]:focus, 
.cmx-form-group input[type="password"].hover, 
.cmx-form-group input[type="password"].active, 
.cmx-form-group input[type="password"].focus,
.cmx-form-group input[type="email"]:hover,
.cmx-form-group input[type="email"]:active,
.cmx-form-group input[type="email"]:focus,
.cmx-form-group input[type="email"].hover,
.cmx-form-group input[type="email"].active,
.cmx-form-group input[type="email"].focus,
.cmx-form-group input[type="search"]:hover,
.cmx-form-group input[type="search"]:active,
.cmx-form-group input[type="search"]:focus,
.cmx-form-group input[type="search"].hover,
.cmx-form-group input[type="search"].active,
.cmx-form-group input[type="search"].focus {
  outline: 0 none;
  border-color: #3FA9F5;
  background: #FFF;
}

.cmx-form-group input[type="text"]::-webkit-input-placeholder,
.cmx-form-group input[type="password"]::-webkit-input-placeholder,
.cmx-form-group input[type="email"]::-webkit-input-placeholder,
.cmx-form-group input[type="search"]::-webkit-input-placeholder {
  /* Chrome/Opera/Safari */
  color: #666;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.cmx-form-group input[type="text"]::-moz-placeholder,
.cmx-form-group input[type="password"]::-moz-placeholder,
.cmx-form-group input[type="email"]::-moz-placeholder,
.cmx-form-group input[type="search"]::-moz-placeholder {
  /* Firefox 19+ */
  color: #666;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.cmx-form-group input[type="text"]:-ms-input-placeholder,
.cmx-form-group input[type="password"]:-ms-input-placeholder,
.cmx-form-group input[type="email"]:-ms-input-placeholder,
.cmx-form-group input[type="search"]:-ms-input-placeholder {
  /* IE 10+ */
  color: #666;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.cmx-form-group input[type="text"]:-moz-placeholder,
.cmx-form-group input[type="password"]:-moz-placeholder,
.cmx-form-group input[type="email"]:-moz-placeholder,
.cmx-form-group input[type="search"]:-moz-placeholder {
  /* Firefox 18- */
  color: #666;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

Text area element

Provide error message here, if any. 
<form action="" method="">
    <h2>Text area element</h2>
    <div class="spacer-32"></div>

    <div class="cmx-form-group">
        <label for="textarea-field">Text area element</label>
        <textarea id="textarea-field" class="cmx-form-control"></textarea>
    </div>
    <!-- end .form-group -->

    <div class="spacer-32"></div>

    <div class="cmx-form-group active">
        <label for="textarea-active-field">Text area element</label>
        <textarea id="textarea-active-field" class="cmx-form-control"></textarea>
    </div>
    <!-- end .form-group .active -->

    <div class="spacer-32"></div>

    <div class="cmx-form-group error">
        <label for="textarea-error-field">Text area element</label>
        <textarea id="textarea-error-field" class="cmx-form-control"></textarea>
        <span class="cmx-error-message">Provide error message here, if any.</span>
    </div>
    <!-- end .form-group .error -->
</form>
.cmx-form-group {

        label {
            display: inline-block;
            font-size: $font-size-12;
            line-height: $line-height-12;
            color: $deep-blue;
            padding-bottom: 6px;
            margin-bottom: 0px;
            cursor: pointer;
        } // end label

        .cmx-form-control {
            display: block;
            width: 100%;
        } // end form-control

        &.active {
            textarea {
                border: 1px solid $bright-blue;
                background: $true-white;
            }
        } // end active class

        &.error {
            textarea {
                border:1px solid $true-red;
                background: rgba(238, 61, 66, 0.05);

                &:active,
                &:focus,
                &.active,
                &.focus {
                    outline: 0 none;
                    border-color: $bright-blue;
                    background: $true-white;
                }
            }

            .cmx-error-message {
                font-size: $font-size-12;
                color: $true-red;
                width: 100%;
                display: inline-block;
                text-align: right;
            }
        } // end error class

        textarea {
            font-size: $font-size-16;
            line-height: $line-height-16;
            border-radius: $radius-3;
            height: 48px;
            padding: 16px;
            border: 1px solid #ADAEBB;
            background: $true-white;

            &:hover, 
            &:active,
            &:focus,
            &.hover,
            &.active,
            &.focus {
                outline: 0 none;
                border-color: $bright-blue;
                background: $true-white;
            }

            &::-webkit-input-placeholder { /* Chrome/Opera/Safari */
              color: $medium-grey;
              font-size: $font-size-16;
            }

            &::-moz-placeholder { /* Firefox 19+ */
              color: $medium-grey;
              font-size: $font-size-16;
            }

            &:-ms-input-placeholder { /* IE 10+ */
              color: $medium-grey;
              font-size: $font-size-16;
            }

            &:-moz-placeholder { /* Firefox 18- */
              color: $medium-grey;
              font-size: $font-size-16;
            }
        } // end input(s) basic definition

        // textarea 
        textarea {
            min-height: 104px;
            font-size: $font-size-16;
            line-height: $line-height-18;

            &::-webkit-input-placeholder { /* Chrome/Opera/Safari */
              color: $medium-grey;
              font-size: $font-size-16;
              line-height: $line-height-18;
            }

            &::-moz-placeholder { /* Firefox 19+ */
              color: $medium-grey;
              font-size: $font-size-16;
              line-height: $line-height-18;
            }

            &:-ms-input-placeholder { /* IE 10+ */
              color: $medium-grey;
              font-size: $font-size-16;
              line-height: $line-height-18;
            }

            &:-moz-placeholder { /* Firefox 18- */
              color: $medium-grey;
              font-size: $font-size-16;
              line-height: $line-height-18;
            }
        }
    } // end form group
.cmx-form-group label {
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  line-height: 0.75rem;
  color: #001B3A;
  padding-bottom: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 0px;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.cmx-form-group .form-control {
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
}

.cmx-form-group.active textarea {
  border: 1px solid #3FA9F5;
  background: #FFF;
}

.cmx-form-group.error textarea {
  border: 1px solid #EE3D42;
  background: rgba(238, 61, 66, 0.05);
}

.cmx-form-group.error textarea:active, 
.cmx-form-group.error textarea:focus, 
.cmx-form-group.error textarea.active, 
.cmx-form-group.error textarea.focus {
  outline: 0 none;
  border-color: #3FA9F5;
  background: #FFF;
}

.cmx-form-group.error .cmx-error-message {
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  color: #EE3D42;
  width: 100%;
  display: inline-block;
  text-align: right;
}

.cmx-form-group textarea {
  font-size: 1rem;
  line-height: 1rem;
  border-radius: 3px;
  height: 48px;
  padding: 16px;
  border: 1px solid #ADAEBB;
  background: #FFF;
}

.cmx-form-group textarea:hover, 
.cmx-form-group textarea:active, 
.cmx-form-group textarea:focus, 
.cmx-form-group textarea.hover, 
.cmx-form-group textarea.active, 
.cmx-form-group textarea.focus {
  outline: 0 none;
  border-color: #3FA9F5;
  background: #FFF;
}

.cmx-form-group textarea::-webkit-input-placeholder {
  /* Chrome/Opera/Safari */
  color: #666;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.cmx-form-group textarea::-moz-placeholder {
  /* Firefox 19+ */
  color: #666;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.cmx-form-group textarea:-ms-input-placeholder {
  /* IE 10+ */
  color: #666;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.cmx-form-group textarea:-moz-placeholder {
  /* Firefox 18- */
  color: #666;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.cmx-form-group textarea {
  min-height: 104px;
  font-size: 1rem;
  line-height: 1.125rem;
}

.cmx-form-group textarea::-webkit-input-placeholder {
  /* Chrome/Opera/Safari */
  color: #666;
  font-size: 1rem;
  line-height: 1.125rem;
}

.cmx-form-group textarea::-moz-placeholder {
  /* Firefox 19+ */
  color: #666;
  font-size: 1rem;
  line-height: 1.125rem;
}

.cmx-form-group textarea:-ms-input-placeholder {
  /* IE 10+ */
  color: #666;
  font-size: 1rem;
  line-height: 1.125rem;
}

.cmx-form-group textarea:-moz-placeholder {
  /* Firefox 18- */
  color: #666;
  font-size: 1rem;
  line-height: 1.125rem;
}

Select list - indent, padding

<form action="" method="">
    <h2>Select list - indent, padding</h2>
    <div class="spacer-32"></div>

    <div class="cmx-form-group">
        <label for="country-field">Country</label>
        <select id="country-field" class="cmx-form-control">
            <option ng-repeat+>Afghanistan</option>
            <option>Albania</option>
            <option>Algeria</option>
            <option>Andorra</option>
            <option>Angola</option>
            <option>Argentina</option>
            <option>France</option>
            <option>Germany</option>
            <option>USA</option>
        </select>
    </div>
    <!-- end .form-group -->

    <div class="spacer-32"></div>

    <div class="cmx-form-group active">
        <label for="country-field-active">Country</label>
        <select id="country-field-active" class="cmx-form-control">
            <option ng-repeat+>Afghanistan</option>
            <option>Albania</option>
            <option>Algeria</option>
            <option>Andorra</option>
            <option>Angola</option>
            <option>Argentina</option>
            <option>France</option>
            <option>Germany</option>
            <option>USA</option>
        </select>
    </div>
    <!-- end .form-group .active -->

    <div class="spacer-32"></div>

    <div class="cmx-form-group error">
        <label for="country-field-error">Country</label>
        <select id="country-field-error" class="cmx-form-control">
            <option ng-repeat+>Afghanistan</option>
            <option>Albania</option>
            <option>Algeria</option>
            <option>Andorra</option>
            <option>Angola</option>
            <option>Argentina</option>
            <option>France</option>
            <option>Germany</option>
            <option>USA</option>
        </select>
    </div>
    <!-- end .form-group .error -->
    </form>
.cmx-form-group {

        label {
            display: inline-block;
            font-size: $font-size-12;
            line-height: $line-height-12;
            color: $deep-blue;
            padding-bottom: 6px;
            margin-bottom: 0px;
            cursor: pointer;
        } // end label

        .cmx-form-control {
            display: block;
            width: 100%;
        } // end form-control

        &.active {
            select {
                border: 1px solid $bright-blue;
                background: $true-white;
            }

            // select filed needs extra rules
            select {
                -webkit-appearance: none;
                -webkit-border-radius: $radius-3;
                background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg version='1.1' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24'><path fill='#3FA9F5' d='M7.406 7.828l4.594 4.594 4.594-4.594 1.406 1.406-6 6-6-6z'></path></svg>");
                background-position: 99% 55%;
                background-repeat: no-repeat;
            }   
        } // end active class

        &.error {
            select {
                border:1px solid $true-red;
                background: rgba(238, 61, 66, 0.05);

                &:active,
                &:focus,
                &.active,
                &.focus {
                    outline: 0 none;
                    border-color: $bright-blue;
                    background: $true-white;
                }
            }

            // select filed needs extra rules
            select {
                -webkit-appearance: none;
                -webkit-border-radius: $radius-3;
                background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg version='1.1' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24'><path fill='#EE3D42' d='M7.406 7.828l4.594 4.594 4.594-4.594 1.406 1.406-6 6-6-6z'></path></svg>");
                background-position: 99% 55%;
                background-repeat: no-repeat;

                // rules need to apply also on states
                &:active,
                &:focus,
                &.active,
                &.focus {
                    -webkit-appearance: none;
                    -webkit-border-radius: $radius-3;
                    background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg version='1.1' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24'><path fill='#3FA9F5' d='M7.406 7.828l4.594 4.594 4.594-4.594 1.406 1.406-6 6-6-6z'></path></svg>");
                    background-position: 99% 55%;
                    background-repeat: no-repeat;
                }
            }

            .cmx-error-message {
                font-size: $font-size-12;
                color: $true-red;
                width: 100%;
                display: inline-block;
                text-align: right;
            }
        } // end error class

        select {
            font-size: $font-size-16;
            line-height: $line-height-16;
            border-radius: $radius-3;
            height: 48px;
            padding: 16px;
            border: 1px solid #ADAEBB;
            background: $true-white;

            &:hover, 
            &:active,
            &:focus,
            &.hover,
            &.active,
            &.focus {
                outline: 0 none;
                border-color: $bright-blue;
                background: $true-white;
            }

            &::-webkit-input-placeholder { /* Chrome/Opera/Safari */
              color: $medium-grey;
              font-size: $font-size-16;
            }

            &::-moz-placeholder { /* Firefox 19+ */
              color: $medium-grey;
              font-size: $font-size-16;
            }

            &:-ms-input-placeholder { /* IE 10+ */
              color: $medium-grey;
              font-size: $font-size-16;
            }

            &:-moz-placeholder { /* Firefox 18- */
              color: $medium-grey;
              font-size: $font-size-16;
            }
        } // end input(s) basic definition

        // select
        select {
            font-size: $font-size-16;
            line-height: $line-height-18;
            border-radius: $radius-3;
            height: 48px;
            border: 1px solid #ADAEBB;
            background: $true-white;
            cursor: pointer;
            text-indent: 7px;
            padding: 7px;

            -webkit-appearance: none;
            -webkit-border-radius: $radius-3;
            background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg version='1.1' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24'><path fill='#3FA9F5' d='M7.406 7.828l4.594 4.594 4.594-4.594 1.406 1.406-6 6-6-6z'></path></svg>");
            background-position: 99% 55%;
            background-repeat: no-repeat;

            &:hover,
            &:focus,
            &:active,
            &.hover,
            &.focus,
            &.active {
                outline: 0 none;
                border-color: $bright-blue;
                background: $true-white;

                -webkit-appearance: none;
                -webkit-border-radius: $radius-3;
                background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg version='1.1' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24'><path fill='#3FA9F5' d='M7.406 7.828l4.594 4.594 4.594-4.594 1.406 1.406-6 6-6-6z'></path></svg>");
                background-position: 99% 55%;
                background-repeat: no-repeat;
            }
        } // end select separate definition
    } // end form group
.cmx-form-group label {
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  line-height: 0.75rem;
  color: #001B3A;
  padding-bottom: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 0px;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.cmx-form-group .cmx-form-control {
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
}

.cmx-form-group.active select {
  border: 1px solid #3FA9F5;
  background: #FFF;
}

.cmx-form-group.active select {
  -webkit-appearance: none;
  -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
  background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg version='1.1' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24'><path fill='#3FA9F5' d='M7.406 7.828l4.594 4.594 4.594-4.594 1.406 1.406-6 6-6-6z'></path></svg>");
  background-position: 99% 55%;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
}

  border: 1px solid #EE3D42;
  background: rgba(238, 61, 66, 0.05);
}

  font-size: 1rem;
}

Number field

Provide error message here, if any. 
<!--REGULAR-->
<div class="cmx-form-group">
    <div class="cmx-number-field-wrapper">
        <label for="number-field-1">Number field</label>
        <input id="number-field-1" class="cmx-form-control cmx-number-control" type="number" value="" placeholder="0" min="" max="" step=""/>
        <span class="cmx-number-field-btn cmx-minus-btn ripple">
            <button type="button" class="cmx-number-field-btn__btn">
                <span class="cmx-icon-minus" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                <span class="sr-only">Decrease</span>
            </button>
        </span>
        <span class="cmx-number-field-btn cmx-plus-btn ripple">
            <button type="button" class="cmx-number-field-btn__btn">
                <span class="cmx-icon-plus" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                <span class="sr-only">Increase</span>
            </button>
        </span>
    </div>
</div>

<!--ACTIVE-->
<div class="cmx-form-group active">
    <div class="cmx-number-field-wrapper">
        <label for="number-field-2">Number field</label>
        <input id="number-field-2" class="cmx-form-control cmx-number-control" type="number" value="" placeholder="0" min="" max="" />
        <span class="cmx-number-field-btn cmx-minus-btn ripple">
            <button type="button" class="cmx-number-field-btn__btn">
                <span class="cmx-icon-minus" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                <span class="sr-only">Decrease</span>
            </button>
        </span>
        <span class="cmx-number-field-btn cmx-plus-btn ripple">
            <button type="button" class="cmx-number-field-btn__btn">
                <span class="cmx-icon-plus" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                <span class="sr-only">Increase</span>
            </button>
        </span>
    </div>
</div>

<!-- ERROR -->
<div class="cmx-form-group error">
    <div class="cmx-number-field-wrapper">
        <label for="number-field-3">Number field</label>
        <input id="number-field-3" class="cmx-form-control cmx-number-control" type="number" value="" placeholder="0" min="" max="" />
        <span class="cmx-number-field-btn cmx-minus-btn ripple">
            <button type="button" class="cmx-number-field-btn__btn">
                <span class="cmx-icon-minus" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                <span class="sr-only">Decrease</span>
            </button>
        </span>
        <span class="cmx-number-field-btn cmx-plus-btn ripple">
            <button type="button" class="cmx-number-field-btn__btn">
                <span class="cmx-icon-plus" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                <span class="sr-only">Increase</span>
            </button>
        </span>
    </div>
    <span class="cmx-error-message">Provide error message here, if any.</span>
</div>
.cmx-form-group {

        label {
            display: inline-block;
            font-size: $font-size-12;
            line-height: $line-height-12;
            color: $deep-blue;
            padding-bottom: 6px;
            margin-bottom: 0px;
            cursor: pointer;
        } // end label

        .cmx-form-control {
            display: block;
            width: 100%;
        } // end form-control

        &.active {
            //number field treatment
            .cmx-number-field-wrapper {
                .cmx-number-field-btn {
                    &.cmx-minus-btn {
                        border-right: 1px solid #ADAEBB;
                        svg {
                            fill: $bright-blue;
                        }
                    }
                    &.cmx-plus-btn {
                        border-left: 1px solid #ADAEBB;
                        svg {
                            fill: $bright-blue;
                        }
                    }
                }
            } // end number-field-wrapper
        } // end active class

        &.error {
            .cmx-error-message {
                font-size: $font-size-12;
                color: $true-red;
                width: 100%;
                display: inline-block;
                text-align: right;
            }

            //number field treatment
            .cmx-number-field-wrapper {
                .cmx-number-field-btn {
                    &.minus-btn {
                        border-right: 1px solid $true-red;
                        svg {
                            fill: $true-red;
                        }
                    }
                    &.plus-btn {
                        border-left: 1px solid $true-red;
                        svg {
                            fill: $true-red;
                        }
                    }
                }

                // a more complex hover interaction on the element
                // because has the buttons (+/-) contained as sub-elements
                &:hover {
                    .cmx-minus-btn,
                    .cmx-plus-btn {
                        svg {
                            fill: $bright-blue;
                        }
                    }
                    .cmx-minus-btn {
                        border-right: 1px solid #ADAEBB;
                    }
                    .cmx-plus-btn {
                        border-left: 1px solid #ADAEBB;
                    }
                } // end complex hover interaction
            } // end number-field-wrapper   
        } // end error class

        // number type
        input[type="number"] {
            text-align: center;
        }

        // hiding the number type spinner
        input[type="number"]::-webkit-outer-spin-button,
        input[type="number"]::-webkit-inner-spin-button {
            -webkit-appearance: none;
            margin: 0;
        }
        input[type="number"] {
            -moz-appearance: textfield;
        }

        .cmx-number-field-wrapper {
            position: relative;

            // button rules
            button {
                cursor: pointer;
                background: none;
                border: 0 none;
                width: 46px;
                height: 46px;
                line-height: 46px;

                &:focus,
                &:active {
                    outline: 0 none;
                }
            } // end buttons rules

            .cmx-number-field-btn {
                display: inline-block;
                width: 46px;
                height: 46px;
                line-height: 46px;

                // positioning the minus button
                &.cmx-minus-btn {
                    position: absolute;
                    bottom: 1px;
                    left: 1px;
                    border-right:1px solid #ADAEBB;

                    svg {
                        width: 16px;
                        margin-top: 10px;
                        fill: $bright-blue;
                    }

                    &:hover,
                    &:focus,
                    &:active {
                        border-right: 1px solid $bright-blue;
                    }
                } // end minus-btn

                // positioning the plus button
                &.cmx-plus-btn {
                    position: absolute;
                    bottom: 1px;
                    right: 1px;
                    border-left: 1px solid #ADAEBB;

                    svg {
                        width: 16px;
                        margin-top: 9px;
                        fill: $bright-blue;
                    }

                    &:hover,
                    &:focus,
                    &:active {
                        border-left: 1px solid $bright-blue;
                    }
                } // end plus-btn
            } // end number field btn
        } // end number field wrapper
    } // end form group
.cmx-form-group label {
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 0.75rem;
  line-height: 0.75rem;
  color: #001B3A;
  padding-bottom: 6px;
  margin-bottom: 0px;
  cursor: pointer;
}

  display: block;
  width: 100%;
}

  border-right: 1px solid #ADAEBB;
}

  fill: #3FA9F5;
}

  border-left: 1px solid #ADAEBB;

}
